item.title: Buildspec for Hugo Extended on Amazon Linux 2
item.author: trevor.ryan.mccormick@gmail.com (Trevor McCormick)
item.description: Are you frustrated that your Hugo website builds are not reflecting your local changes? If you’re using scss files to manage your website styling, and the changes you make locally are not showing up on web server, then you might be facing challenges installing Hugo Extended. Here are some common errors you might see in AWS CloudWatch: 1 2 hugo: /lib64/libm.so.6: version 'GLIBC_2.29' not found (required by hugo) hugo: /lib64/libstdc++.
